description:
Use your phone as a camera directly in OBS Studio.


- Revert Android platform tools (adb.exe) to version 33, due to slow/laggy startup issues in last update.
- Added arm64 builds for Windows, to go along with OBS 31.1.
  - The setup exe will automatically detect your processor architecture and install the correct variant of droidcam-obs.
  - USB connection support is limited due to lack of drivers for many devices.
- Custom Resolutions: you can now input custom values into the 'Resolution' field of your DroidCam OBS source.
  - You are no longer limited to the built-in 640x480 ... 1920x1080 drop-down values.
  - Requires the latest update for the DroidCam app (v8.x)
  - Use the 'Camera Information' / 'Camera Probe' option in the DroidCam app settings to get a list of supported capture resolutions on your phone.
Home page: droidcam.app/obs
DroidCamOBS.Setup.2.4.0.exe (Windows 10/11 (x64, arm64), OBS v30.2+)
DroidCamOBS_2.4.0_macos.pkg (macOS 10.13+ (x64, arm64), OBS v30.2+)
droidcam_obs_2.4.0_linux_flatpak.zip (Linux systems with FFmpeg7/libavcodec61 (x64))
